mapper.insert: insert into cumuboard(cuseq, cutitle, cuwriter, cucontent) values((select nvl(max(cuseq), 0)+1 from cumuboard),#{cutitle},#{cuwriter},#{cucontent})
mapper.select:
SELECT cuseq, cutitle, CUCONTENT, CUWRITER, CUREGDATE, cucnt FROM ( SELECT cuseq, cutitle, CUCONTENT, CUWRITER, CUREGDATE, cucnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cuseq DESC) AS RNUM FROM cumuboard ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
AND cutitle like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and cucontent like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY cuseq DESC
SELECT COUNT(cuseq) FROM cumuboard WHERE cuseq > 0
update cumuboard set cucnt = cucnt + 1 where cuseq = #{cuseq}
mapper.update: update cumuboard set cutitle=#{cutitle}, cucontent=#{cucontent} where cuseq=#{cuseq}
